title: report baiting is a thing
body:
i know it is hard (usually) to tell if someone is doing it but there needs to be something done about it. 

if you dont know what this is, it is when someone is toxic but doing it in a way that wont show up on Riot's radar. They do it so that they can make other people had tilt into saying things in chat then they report them.

replies.body: Then you submit a support ticket to appeal the punishment and explain the situation. Do notw that retaliating to someone else be toxic is not necessarily the same as baiting for a ban.

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6vvV6zob,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-07T03:22:21.905+0000)
>
> Then you submit a support ticket to appeal the punishment and explain the situation. 

Riot doesn't give a shit about details. 

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6vvV6zob,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-07T03:22:21.905+0000)
>
Do notw that retaliating to someone else be toxic is not necessarily the same as baiting for a ban.

This is their main goal is to get someone to retaliate so they can report. They do it in a way to fly under the radar. If you mute them and mute pings they will start inting or they will follow and troll. They do everything they can to get people to retaliate and then they smash the report button. The victims get punished and they continue their trolling.

> [{quoted}](name=RoG Seraph,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6vvV6zob,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-07T03:52:54.779+0000)
>
> Riot doesn't give a shit about details. 

Yet they reverted bans from the "bait banning" incident a while back.

> 
> This is their main goal is to get someone to retaliate so they can report. They do it in a way to fly under the radar. If you mute them and mute pings they will start inting or they will follow and troll. They do everything they can to get people to retaliate and then they smash the report button. The victims get punished and they continue their trolling.

Then let them int and troll. If they are trying to get you to say certain phrases, then don't. Obviously you are smart enough to recognize it. If you somehow failed to realize it, then support ticket and maybe it gets fixed.

You can just reverse troll them by role playing lux. Just use any of her disgustingly positive quotes, and then smiles. It’s never failed for me. They’re usually loss for words and can’t proceed further without being actually toxic.

but in no way do they violate Riots code of conduct, they simply play on our feelings with passive agressive words, if they do not violate the terms of service, and the victim does, its their geniusness, they aren't abusing any systems, Ban baiters I know and have qued with are barely on borderline insult, they don't even say words that are considered bad by the ToS or Summoners code, although unethical, its not illegal.

I'm sorry if someone got underneath your skin and riled you up, that isn't very fun or very fair. Sometimes the best way to get through a game is to just mute everyone, so you don't have a chance to respond to negativity! Beyond that, I can only hope you can find something that brings you calm and helps you find your center of peace and tranquility while playing. 

Mine is playing Sona! :D {{sticker:sona-playing}}  #SonaNeedMoreCuteStickersInTheForum
